name: Dinguskinesis
description:
Prototype release of a game I've been working on. Unsure if development will continue.

Best described as a marble obstacle course of sorts with the primary objective being getting the dingus to the end of the level as fast as possible. 

Game is unintentionally quite difficult. Whoops!

There are currently 3 short levels. There are 5 ranks for each: bronze, silver, gold, diamond, and dev. With dev being an orange indicator showing that you've beaten my time on the level.

There's a bonus room if you get at least diamond on all three levels. It's not a level, just small reward.

Press Escape for the options menu to turn down sound/music or exit the level/game. 

Press R to reset the current level.
